transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ji, Kisaan ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Hello, ji, Kisaan ji baat kar rahe hain? Ji baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataiye madam.
Executive: Sir, review check kar rahe the aapka, Kisaan Kalyan Krishi Kendra.
Executive: Abhi toh slow hai madam, down nahi hai abhi toh.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain, kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Down nahi hai madam abhi toh.
Executive: Toh sir, jaise ki main dekh pa rahi hu aapke total abhi 16 products hain, 16 products. Currently aap kitne products kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh sir, jaise ki sir main dekh pa rahi hu ki aap jaise aap bol rahe ho ki aapko business nahi aa raha. Main aapko batati hu sir kyun nahi aa raha kyunki aap jo aapke jo product hai Mahindra tractor, ab inme dekhiye aapne jo categories ki match kari hai. Kya aap kabhi video mein connect kar sakte hain?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Madam, main abhi bahar aaya hu.
Executive: Hello, toh haan sir, main phir kitni der baad aapko connect kar sakti hu?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Aaj toh nahi ho payegi.
Customer: Aaj nahi ho payegi.
Executive: Toh kal, kal, hello.
Customer: Haan, kal kar lenge.
Executive: O- okay sir, kal connect karte hain aapko. Theek, theek hai.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Customer says the portal is down.



Resolution:

- Executive said the portal is slow, not down.

- Executive offered a video call to fix categories.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- business, products, categories, video call
